verses.name: Judges 21:1
verses.text: Now the men of Israel had sworn in Mizpeh, saying, There shall not any of us give his daughter unto Benjamin to wife.

verses.name: Judges 21:2
verses.text: And the people came to the house of God, and abode there till even before God, and lifted up their voices, and wept sore;

verses.name: Judges 21:3
verses.text: And said, O Lord God of Israel, why is this come to pass in Israel, that there should be to day one tribe lacking in Israel?

verses.name: Judges 21:4
verses.text: And it came to pass on the morrow, that the people rose early, and built there an altar, and offered burnt offerings and peace offerings.
